journey.title: My Journey
journey.content: Hi! I'm Dymitr Dworakowski, Junior Full-Stack Developer. I've always been passionate about technology and design, and I knew from my first projects that I wanted to create beautiful and functional web applications.

focus.title: What I Focus On
focus.content: I like to work on projects that combine a user-friendly interface and powerful functionality. I believe that good design is not only about aesthetics, but also about ease of use.

skills.title: Skills & Tools
skills.content: I use HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and React to create efficient and modern interfaces. I also work with Node.js and MongoDB, which allows me to work on the full application stack.

inspiration.title: What Inspires Me
inspiration.content: I draw inspiration from design and user feedback. Every new project is a chance to learn something new and improve my skills.

connect.title: Let's Connect!
connect.content: I am always open to new ideas and cooperation. If you have an interesting project or a question, I would be happy to chat!

responsibilities.1: Contributing to the development and maintenance of internal systems
responsibilities.2: Maintaining and upgrading computer networks and hardware
responsibilities.4: Network security management and performance optimization

responsibilities.1: Handled initial client inquiries and support tickets
responsibilities.2: Troubleshot software, hardware and network issues
responsibilities.3: Managed help desk systems and documentation
